name: TAPSONIC BOLD
description: MEET POPULAR RHYTHM ACTION GAME 'TAPSONIC' SERIES NOW ON STEAM!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz AMD Athlon 64 X2 6000+ 3.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700 Series or AMD RX200 Series DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64bit) DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
